text.text_translated:
Sometimes, bridges fall down. We do not know why. It is something we do not understand. People who build bridges must look at the bridge carefully. Then they find out the reason.
Sometimes, the material for the bridge is weak. Or a main part of the bridge has a problem.
Other times, people build the bridge for only some weight. It cannot hold more.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Some bridges fall down. We do not know why. This is a mystery. Engineers must study the bridge completely. After this, they find the reason.
Sometimes, the material for the bridge is bad. Or a main part of the bridge has a problem.
Other times, people build the bridge for only some weight. It cannot hold more.
